data.event: CORSICANA — A Henderson County woman was sentenced to 99 years in prison for her role in a mortgage fraud scheme on Monday.

data.event: CORSICANA — A Henderson County woman was sentenced to 99 years in prison for her role in a mortgage fraud scheme on Monday.

event.title: March 17, a Navarro County jury found

data.event: On March 17, a Navarro County jury found the defendant, Kandace Yancy Marriott, 52, of Gun Barrel City, guilty of engaging in organized criminal activity.
The defendants closed the One Way Home & Land after litigation and investigations ensued in late 2005.
